titleStmt.title: Reliquiae Wottonianae, or, A collection of lives, letters, poems with characters of sundry personages : and other incomparable pieces of language and art : also additional letters to several persons, not before printed / by the curious pencil of the ever memorable Sir Henry Wottan ...
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Henry, Sir, 1568-1639.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition, with large additions.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Roycroft for R. Marriott, F. Tyton, T. Collins and J. Ford,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
